concept.title: What is the Clipboard tool in Microsoft Word?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will find out about the Clipboard tool in Microsoft Word.

conbody.p: The Clipboard tool allows you to insert portions of text, like names, addresses, instructions, etc. in a Word document, instead of cutting or copying and pasting.
The clipboard in Microsoft Word holds up to 24 items at one time. This means that all of those things you cut or copied throughout the day are just a click away.
